sqlMap.select: select * from (select count(a.mus_no) as count, b.mus_no, b.mus_title, b.mus_befor_rank, c.alb_image, d.sing_name from music_history a, music b, album c, singer d where a.mus_no = b.mus_no and b.alb_no = c.alb_no and c.sing_no = d.sing_no and a.histo_indate = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') group by b.mus_no, b.MUS_TITLE,b.mus_befor_rank,d.sing_name,c.alb_image order by count(a.mus_no) desc) where rownum <= 50
